In<S>1722</S> the mean time<S>3739</S>, when there were gathered together<S>1996</S> an innumerable multitude<S>3461</S> of people<S>3793</S>, insomuch that<S>5620</S> they trode<S>2662</S> one upon another<S>240</S>, he began<S>756</S> to say<S>3004</S> unto<S>4314</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S> first of all<S>4412</S>, Beware<S>4337</S> ye<S>1438</S> of<S>575</S> the leaven<S>2219</S> of the Pharisees<S>5330</S>, which<S>3748</S> is<S>2076</S> hypocrisy<S>5272</S>.
For<S>1161</S> there is<S>2076</S> nothing<S>3762</S> covered<S>4780</S>, that<S>3739</S> shall<S>601</S> not<S>3756</S> be revealed<S>601</S>; neither<S>2532</S> hid<S>2927</S>, that<S>3739</S> shall<S>1097</S> not<S>3756</S> be known<S>1097</S>.
Therefore<S>473</S> <S>3739</S> whatsoever<S>3745</S> ye have spoken<S>2036</S> in<S>1722</S> darkness<S>4653</S> shall be heard<S>191</S> in<S>1722</S> the light<S>5457</S>; and<S>2532</S> that which<S>3739</S> ye have spoken<S>2980</S> in<S>4314</S> the ear<S>3775</S> in<S>1722</S> closets<S>5009</S> shall be proclaimed<S>2784</S> upon<S>1909</S> the housetops<S>1430</S>.
And<S>1161</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S> my<S>3450</S> friends<S>5384</S>, Be<S>5399</S> not<S>3361</S> afraid<S>5399</S> of them<S>575</S> that kill<S>615</S> the body<S>4983</S>, and<S>2532</S> after<S>3326</S> that<S>5023</S> have<S>2192</S> no<S>3361</S> <S>5100</S> more<S>4055</S> that they can do<S>4160</S>.
But<S>1161</S> I will forewarn<S>5263</S> you<S>5213</S> whom<S>5101</S> ye shall fear<S>5399</S>: Fear<S>5399</S> him, which after<S>3326</S> he hath killed<S>615</S> hath<S>2192</S> power<S>1849</S> to cast<S>1685</S> into<S>1519</S> hell<S>1067</S>; yea<S>3483</S>, I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, Fear<S>5399</S> him<S>5126</S>.
Are<S>4453</S> not<S>3780</S> five<S>4002</S> sparrows<S>4765</S> sold<S>4453</S> for two<S>1417</S> farthings<S>787</S>, and<S>2532</S> not<S>3756</S> one<S>1520</S> of<S>1537</S> them<S>846</S> is<S>2076</S> forgotten<S>1950</S> before<S>1799</S> God<S>2316</S>?
But<S>235</S> even the very<S>2532</S> hairs<S>2359</S> of your<S>5216</S> head<S>2776</S> are<S>705</S> all<S>3956</S> numbered<S>705</S>. Fear<S>5399</S> not<S>3361</S> therefore<S>3767</S>: ye are of more value<S>1308</S> than many<S>4183</S> sparrows<S>4765</S>.
Also<S>1161</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, Whosoever<S>3956</S> <S>3739</S> <S>302</S> shall confess<S>3670</S> <S>1722</S> me<S>1698</S> before<S>1715</S> men<S>444</S>,<S>1722</S> him<S>846</S> shall<S>3670</S> the Son<S>5207</S> of man<S>444</S> also<S>2532</S> confess<S>3670</S> before<S>1715</S> the angels<S>32</S> of God<S>2316</S>:
But<S>1161</S> he that denieth<S>720</S> me<S>3165</S> before<S>1799</S> men<S>444</S> shall be denied<S>533</S> before<S>1799</S> the angels<S>32</S> of God<S>2316</S>.
And<S>2532</S> whosoever<S>3956</S> <S>3739</S> shall speak<S>2046</S> a word<S>3056</S> against<S>1519</S> the Son<S>5207</S> of man<S>444</S>, it shall be forgiven<S>863</S> him<S>846</S>: but<S>1161</S> unto him that blasphemeth<S>987</S> against<S>1519</S> the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S> it shall<S>863</S> not<S>3756</S> be forgiven<S>863</S>.
And<S>1161</S> when<S>3752</S> they bring<S>4374</S> you<S>5209</S> unto<S>1909</S> the synagogues<S>4864</S>, and<S>2532</S> unto magistrates<S>746</S>, and<S>2532</S> powers<S>1849</S>, take<S>3309</S> ye no<S>3361</S> thought<S>3309</S> how<S>4459</S> or<S>2228</S> what thing<S>5101</S> ye shall answer<S>626</S>, or<S>2228</S> what<S>5101</S> ye shall say<S>2036</S>:
For<S>1063</S> the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S> shall teach<S>1321</S> you<S>5209</S> in<S>1722</S> the same<S>846</S> hour<S>5610</S> what<S>3739</S> ye ought<S>1163</S> to say<S>2036</S>.
And<S>1161</S> one<S>5100</S> of<S>1537</S> the company<S>3793</S> said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Master<S>1320</S>, speak<S>2036</S> to my<S>3450</S> brother<S>80</S>, that he divide<S>3307</S> the inheritance<S>2817</S> with<S>3326</S> me<S>1700</S>.
And<S>1161</S> he said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Man<S>444</S>, who<S>5101</S> made<S>2525</S> me<S>3165</S> a judge<S>1348</S> or<S>2228</S> a divider<S>3312</S> over<S>1909</S> you<S>5209</S>?
And<S>1161</S> he said<S>2036</S> unto<S>4314</S> them<S>846</S>, Take heed<S>3708</S>, and<S>2532</S> beware<S>5442</S> of<S>575</S> covetousness<S>4124</S>: for<S>3754</S> a man's<S>5100</S> <S>846</S> life<S>2222</S> consisteth<S>2076</S> not<S>3756</S> in<S>1722</S> the abundance<S>4052</S> of<S>1537</S> the things which he<S>846</S> possesseth<S>5224</S>.
And<S>1161</S> he spake<S>2036</S> a parable<S>3850</S> unto<S>4314</S> them<S>846</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, The ground<S>5561</S> of a certain<S>5100</S> rich<S>4145</S> man<S>444</S> brought forth plentifully<S>2164</S>:
And<S>2532</S> he thought<S>1260</S> within<S>1722</S> himself<S>1438</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, What<S>5101</S> shall I do<S>4160</S>, because<S>3754</S> I have<S>2192</S> no<S>3756</S> room where<S>4226</S> to bestow<S>4863</S> my<S>3450</S> fruits<S>2590</S>?
And<S>2532</S> he said<S>2036</S>, This<S>5124</S> will I do<S>4160</S>: I will pull down<S>2507</S> my<S>3450</S> barns<S>596</S>, and<S>2532</S> build<S>3618</S> greater<S>3187</S>; and<S>2532</S> there<S>1563</S> will I bestow<S>4863</S> all<S>3956</S> my<S>3450</S> fruits<S>1081</S> and<S>2532</S> my<S>3450</S> goods<S>18</S>.
And<S>2532</S> I will say<S>2046</S> to my<S>3450</S> soul<S>5590</S>, Soul<S>5590</S>, thou hast<S>2192</S> much<S>4183</S> goods<S>18</S> laid up<S>2749</S> for<S>1519</S> many<S>4183</S> years<S>2094</S>; take thine ease<S>373</S>, eat<S>5315</S>, drink<S>4095</S>, and be merry<S>2165</S>.
But<S>1161</S> God<S>2316</S> said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Thou fool<S>878</S>, this<S>5026</S> night<S>3571</S> thy<S>4675</S> soul<S>5590</S> shall be required<S>523</S> of<S>575</S> thee<S>4675</S>: then<S>1161</S> whose<S>5101</S> shall those things be<S>2071</S>, which<S>3739</S> thou hast provided<S>2090</S>? <sup>thy: Gr. do they require thy soul</sup>
So<S>3779</S> is he that layeth up treasure<S>2343</S> for himself<S>1438</S>, and<S>2532</S> is<S>4147</S> not<S>3361</S> rich<S>4147</S> toward<S>1519</S> God<S>2316</S>.
And<S>1161</S> he said<S>2036</S> unto<S>4314</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S>, Therefore<S>1223</S> <S>5124</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, Take<S>3309</S> no<S>3361</S> thought<S>3309</S> for your<S>5216</S> life<S>5590</S>, what<S>5101</S> ye shall eat<S>5315</S>; neither<S>3366</S> for the body<S>4983</S>, what<S>5101</S> ye shall put on<S>1746</S>.
The life<S>5590</S> is<S>2076</S> more<S>4119</S> than meat<S>5160</S>, and<S>2532</S> the body<S>4983</S> is more than raiment<S>1742</S>.
Consider<S>2657</S> the ravens<S>2876</S>: for<S>3754</S> they neither<S>3756</S> sow<S>4687</S> nor<S>3761</S> reap<S>2325</S>; which<S>3739</S> neither<S>3756</S> have<S>2076</S> storehouse<S>5009</S> nor<S>3761</S> barn<S>596</S>; and<S>2532</S> God<S>2316</S> feedeth<S>5142</S> them<S>846</S>: how much<S>4214</S> more<S>3123</S> are<S>1308</S> ye<S>5210</S> better than<S>1308</S> the fowls<S>4071</S>?
And<S>1161</S> which<S>5101</S> of<S>1537</S> you<S>5216</S> with taking thought<S>3309</S> can<S>1410</S> add<S>4369</S> to<S>1909</S> his<S>846</S> stature<S>2244</S> one<S>1520</S> cubit<S>4083</S>?
If<S>1487</S> ye then<S>3767</S> be<S>1410</S> not<S>3777</S> able to do<S>1410</S> that thing which is least<S>1646</S>, why<S>5101</S> take ye thought<S>3309</S> for<S>4012</S> the rest<S>3062</S>?
Consider<S>2657</S> the lilies<S>2918</S> how<S>4459</S> they grow<S>837</S>: they toil<S>2872</S> not<S>3756</S>, they spin<S>3514</S> not<S>3761</S>; and yet<S>1161</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, that Solomon<S>4672</S> in<S>1722</S> all<S>3956</S> his<S>846</S> glory<S>1391</S> was<S>4016</S> not<S>3761</S> arrayed<S>4016</S> like<S>5613</S> one<S>1520</S> of these<S>5130</S>.
If<S>1487</S> then<S>1161</S> God<S>2316</S> so<S>3779</S> clothe<S>294</S> the grass<S>5528</S>, which<S>5607</S> is to day<S>4594</S> in<S>1722</S> the field<S>68</S>, and<S>2532</S> to morrow<S>839</S> is cast<S>906</S> into<S>1519</S> the oven<S>2823</S>; how much<S>4214</S> more<S>3123</S> will he clothe you<S>5209</S>, O ye of little faith<S>3640</S>?
And<S>2532</S> seek<S>2212</S> not<S>3361</S> ye<S>5210</S> what<S>5101</S> ye shall eat<S>5315</S>, or<S>2228</S> what<S>5101</S> ye shall drink<S>4095</S>,<S>2532</S> neither<S>3361</S> be ye of doubtful mind<S>3349</S>. <sup>neither: or, live not in careful suspense</sup>
For<S>1063</S> all<S>3956</S> these things<S>5023</S> do<S>1934</S> the nations<S>1484</S> of the world<S>2889</S> seek after<S>1934</S>: and<S>1161</S> your<S>5216</S> Father<S>3962</S> knoweth<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> ye have need<S>5535</S> of these things<S>5130</S>.
But rather<S>4133</S> seek ye<S>2212</S> the kingdom<S>932</S> of God<S>2316</S>; and<S>2532</S> all<S>3956</S> these things<S>5023</S> shall be added<S>4369</S> unto you<S>5213</S>.
Fear<S>5399</S> not<S>3361</S>, little<S>3398</S> flock<S>4168</S>; for<S>3754</S> it is<S>2106</S> your<S>5216</S> Father's<S>3962</S> good pleasure<S>2106</S> to give<S>1325</S> you<S>5213</S> the kingdom<S>932</S>.
Sell<S>4453</S> that ye<S>5216</S> have<S>5224</S>, and<S>2532</S> give<S>1325</S> alms<S>1654</S>; provide<S>4160</S> yourselves<S>1438</S> bags<S>905</S> which wax<S>3822</S> not<S>3361</S> old<S>3822</S>, a treasure<S>2344</S> in<S>1722</S> the heavens<S>3772</S> that faileth not<S>413</S>, where<S>3699</S> no<S>3756</S> thief<S>2812</S> approacheth<S>1448</S>, neither<S>3761</S> moth<S>4597</S> corrupteth<S>1311</S>.
For<S>1063</S> where<S>3699</S> your<S>5216</S> treasure<S>2344</S> is<S>2076</S>, there<S>1563</S> will<S>2071</S> your<S>5216</S> heart<S>2588</S> be<S>2071</S> also<S>2532</S>.
Let<S>2077</S> your<S>5216</S> loins<S>3751</S> be<S>2077</S> girded about<S>4024</S>, and<S>2532</S> your lights<S>3088</S> burning<S>2545</S>;
And<S>2532</S> ye yourselves<S>5210</S> like<S>3664</S> unto men<S>444</S> that wait<S>4327</S> for their<S>1438</S> lord<S>2962</S>, when<S>4219</S> he will return<S>360</S> from<S>1537</S> the wedding<S>1062</S>; that<S>2443</S> when he cometh<S>2064</S> and<S>2532</S> knocketh<S>2925</S>, they may open<S>455</S> unto him<S>846</S> immediately<S>2112</S>.
Blessed<S>3107</S> are those<S>1565</S> servants<S>1401</S>, whom<S>3739</S> the lord<S>2962</S> when he cometh<S>2064</S> shall find<S>2147</S> watching<S>1127</S>: verily<S>281</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, that<S>3754</S> he shall gird himself<S>4024</S>, and<S>2532</S> make<S>347</S> them<S>846</S> to sit down to meat<S>347</S>, and<S>2532</S> will come forth<S>3928</S> and serve<S>1247</S> them<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> if<S>1437</S> he shall come<S>2064</S> in<S>1722</S> the second<S>1208</S> watch<S>5438</S>, or<S>2532</S> come<S>2064</S> in<S>1722</S> the third<S>5154</S> watch<S>5438</S>, and<S>2532</S> find<S>2147</S> them so<S>3779</S>, blessed<S>3107</S> are<S>1526</S> those<S>1565</S> servants<S>1401</S>.
And<S>1161</S> this<S>5124</S> know<S>1097</S>, that<S>3754</S> if<S>1487</S> the goodman of the house<S>3617</S> had known<S>1492</S> what<S>4169</S> hour<S>5610</S> the thief<S>2812</S> would come<S>2064</S>,<S>302</S> he would have watched<S>1127</S>, and<S>2532</S> <S>302</S> not<S>3756</S> have suffered<S>863</S> his<S>846</S> house<S>3624</S> to be broken through<S>1358</S>.
Be<S>1096</S> ye<S>5210</S> therefore<S>3767</S> ready<S>2092</S> also<S>2532</S>: for<S>3754</S> <S>3739</S> the Son<S>5207</S> of man<S>444</S> cometh<S>2064</S> at an hour<S>5610</S> when ye think<S>1380</S> not<S>3756</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> Peter<S>4074</S> said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>, speakest thou<S>3004</S> this<S>5026</S> parable<S>3850</S> unto<S>4314</S> us<S>2248</S>, or<S>2228</S> even<S>2532</S> to<S>4314</S> all<S>3956</S>?
And<S>1161</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> said<S>2036</S>, Who<S>5101</S> then<S>686</S> is<S>2076</S> that faithful<S>4103</S> and<S>2532</S> wise<S>5429</S> steward<S>3623</S>, whom<S>3739</S> his lord<S>2962</S> shall make ruler<S>2525</S> over<S>1909</S> his<S>846</S> household<S>2322</S>, to give<S>1325</S> them their portion of meat<S>4620</S> in<S>1722</S> due season<S>2540</S>?
Blessed<S>3107</S> is that<S>1565</S> servant<S>1401</S>, whom<S>3739</S> his<S>846</S> lord<S>2962</S> when he cometh<S>2064</S> shall find<S>2147</S> so<S>3779</S> doing<S>4160</S>.
Of a truth<S>230</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, that<S>3754</S> he will make him<S>846</S> ruler<S>2525</S> over<S>1909</S> all<S>3956</S> that he<S>846</S> hath<S>5224</S>.
But and<S>1161</S> if<S>1437</S> that<S>1565</S> servant<S>1401</S> say<S>2036</S> in<S>1722</S> his<S>846</S> heart<S>2588</S>, My<S>3450</S> lord<S>2962</S> delayeth<S>5549</S> his coming<S>2064</S>; and<S>2532</S> shall begin<S>756</S> to beat<S>5180</S> the menservants<S>3816</S> and<S>2532</S> maidens<S>3814</S>, and<S>5037</S> to eat<S>2068</S> and<S>2532</S> drink<S>4095</S>, and<S>2532</S> to be drunken<S>3182</S>;
The lord<S>2962</S> of that<S>1565</S> servant<S>1401</S> will come<S>2240</S> in<S>1722</S> a day<S>2250</S> when<S>3739</S> he looketh<S>4328</S> not<S>3756</S> for<S>4328</S> him, and<S>2532</S> at<S>1722</S> an hour<S>5610</S> when<S>3739</S> he is<S>1097</S> not<S>3756</S> aware<S>1097</S>, and<S>2532</S> will cut<S>1371</S> him<S>846</S> in sunder<S>1371</S>, and<S>2532</S> will appoint<S>5087</S> him his<S>846</S> portion<S>3313</S> with<S>3326</S> the unbelievers<S>571</S>. <sup>cut: or, cut him off</sup>
And<S>1161</S> that<S>1565</S> servant<S>1401</S>, which<S>3588</S> knew<S>1097</S> his<S>1438</S> lord's<S>2962</S> will<S>2307</S>, and<S>2532</S> prepared<S>2090</S> not<S>3361</S> himself, neither<S>3366</S> did<S>4160</S> according<S>4314</S> to his<S>846</S> will<S>2307</S>, shall be beaten<S>1194</S> with many<S>4183</S> stripes.
But<S>1161</S> he that knew<S>1097</S> not<S>3361</S>, and<S>1161</S> did commit<S>4160</S> things worthy<S>514</S> of stripes<S>4127</S>, shall be beaten<S>1194</S> with few<S>3641</S> stripes. For<S>1161</S> unto whomsoever<S>3739</S> <S>3956</S> much<S>4183</S> is given<S>1325</S>, of<S>3844</S> him<S>846</S> shall be much<S>4183</S> required<S>2212</S>: and<S>2532</S> to whom men<S>3739</S> have committed<S>3908</S> much<S>4183</S>, of him<S>846</S> they will ask<S>154</S> the more<S>4055</S>.
I am come<S>2064</S> to send<S>906</S> fire<S>4442</S> on<S>1519</S> the earth<S>1093</S>; and<S>2532</S> what<S>5101</S> will I<S>2309</S>, if<S>1487</S> it be<S>381</S> already<S>2235</S> kindled<S>381</S>?
But<S>1161</S> I have<S>2192</S> a baptism<S>908</S> to be baptized with<S>907</S>; and<S>2532</S> how<S>4459</S> am I straitened<S>4912</S> till<S>2193</S> <S>3739</S> it be accomplished<S>5055</S>! <sup>straitened: or, pained</sup>
Suppose ye<S>1380</S> that<S>3754</S> I am come<S>3854</S> to give<S>1325</S> peace<S>1515</S> on<S>1722</S> earth<S>1093</S>? I tell<S>3004</S> you<S>5213</S>, Nay<S>3780</S>; but<S>235</S> rather<S>2228</S> division<S>1267</S>:
For<S>1063</S> from<S>575</S> henceforth<S>3568</S> there shall be<S>2071</S> five<S>4002</S> in<S>1722</S> one<S>1520</S> house<S>3624</S> divided<S>1266</S>, three<S>5140</S> against<S>1909</S> two<S>1417</S>, and<S>2532</S> two<S>1417</S> against<S>1909</S> three<S>5140</S>.
The father<S>3962</S> shall be divided<S>1266</S> against<S>1909</S> the son<S>5207</S>, and<S>2532</S> the son<S>5207</S> against<S>1909</S> the father<S>3962</S>; the mother<S>3384</S> against<S>1909</S> the daughter<S>2364</S>, and<S>2532</S> the daughter<S>2364</S> against<S>1909</S> the mother<S>3384</S>; the mother in law<S>3994</S> against<S>1909</S> her<S>846</S> daughter in law<S>3565</S>, and<S>2532</S> the daughter in law<S>3565</S> against<S>1909</S> her<S>846</S> mother in law<S>3994</S>.
And<S>1161</S> he said<S>3004</S> also<S>2532</S> to the people<S>3793</S>, When<S>3752</S> ye see<S>1492</S> a cloud<S>3507</S> rise<S>393</S> out of<S>575</S> the west<S>1424</S>, straightway<S>2112</S> ye say<S>3004</S>, There cometh<S>2064</S> a shower<S>3655</S>; and<S>2532</S> so<S>3779</S> it is<S>1096</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when<S>3752</S> ye see the south wind<S>3558</S> blow<S>4154</S>, ye say<S>3004</S>,<S>3754</S> There will be<S>2071</S> heat<S>2742</S>; and<S>2532</S> it cometh to pass<S>1096</S>.
 Ye hypocrites<S>5273</S>, ye can<S>1492</S> discern<S>1381</S> the face<S>4383</S> of the sky<S>3772</S> and<S>2532</S> of the earth<S>1093</S>; but<S>1161</S> how is it<S>4459</S> that ye do not<S>3756</S> discern<S>1381</S> this<S>5126</S> time<S>2540</S>?
Yea<S>1161</S>, and why<S>5101</S> even<S>2532</S> of<S>575</S> yourselves<S>1438</S> judge ye<S>2919</S> not<S>3756</S> what is right<S>1342</S>?
When<S>5613</S> <S>1063</S> thou goest<S>5217</S> with<S>3326</S> thine<S>4675</S> adversary<S>476</S> to<S>1909</S> the magistrate<S>758</S>, as thou art in<S>1722</S> the way<S>3598</S>, give<S>1325</S> diligence<S>2039</S> that thou mayest be delivered<S>525</S> from<S>575</S> him<S>846</S>; lest<S>3379</S> he hale<S>2694</S> thee<S>4571</S> to<S>4314</S> the judge<S>2923</S>, and<S>2532</S> the judge<S>2923</S> deliver<S>3860</S> thee<S>4571</S> to the officer<S>4233</S>, and<S>2532</S> the officer<S>4233</S> cast<S>906</S> thee<S>4571</S> into<S>1519</S> prison<S>5438</S>.
I tell<S>3004</S> thee<S>4671</S>, thou shalt<S>1831</S> not<S>3364</S> depart<S>1831</S> thence<S>1564</S>,<S>2532</S> till<S>2193</S> <S>3739</S> thou hast paid<S>591</S> the very last<S>2078</S> mite<S>3016</S>.
